title: Does a computer consume more data than a mobile? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Readers, It actually depends on the applications and data settings which you have configured on your system. like auto updates, restricted background data and some more. compared to mobile device both are similar but not same. typically system consumes much data than mobile because of huge and big software's used in there. so first do properly configure both your mobile and system for proper internet usage then you dont need to worry about the data consumption. Thanks for reading, Keep Reading and Remember Readers are Leaders.

Depends on the data usage on both platforms. Ordinarily, you can consider a keypad phone to consume noticeable lesser data then a normal smartphone and offcourse less than a computer. Smartphones now-a-days come with various settings to limit the usage of Data (Data saver) which does work good. On PCs, most users experience continuous data usage due to windows bandwidth reservation(which you can set off too) or else, the data usage is nearly same.
